dcterms:description: A dataset for identification of homophobia and transphobia in multilingual YouTube comments, containing 15,141 comments classified into Homophobic, Transphobic, or Non-anti-LGBT+ content.
dcterms:title: Multilingual YouTube Comments Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for the shared task on offensive language identification in Tamil, Malayalam, and Kannada, focusing on code-mixed text.
dcterms:title: HASOC-Dravidian-CodeMix-FIRE2020 Dataset
